title: "Daniel P Hall Riggins, MD's CV"
author: Daniel P. Hall Riggins, MD
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: false
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'resume']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
library(here) # Constructs paths to your project's files.
library(glue) # Glue offers interpreted string literals that are small, fast, and dependency-free. 
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = glue("{here(\"data\")}/"),  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
) 

CV$entries_data <-
    CV$entries_data |> 
    dplyr::filter(as.logical(medically_relevant))
```


```{r}

if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
